greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Total number of green nodes among tricolored labeled trees on n nodes.
link: S. Coulomb and M. Bauer, On vertex covers, matchings and random trees
formula: E.g.f.: A(x) = T(-T(x))^2, with T(x)=Sum[k=1..inf, A000169(k)/k!*x^k].
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Jul 30 2004
